reviewText: This DVD is fantastic.  I use my exercise bike and cycle the roads and it's so realisitic.  You find yourself slowing down and working harder when going uphill and then freewheeling down the other side.  The scenery is great, coming from England it makes me homesick, but now I can feel I'm back in the old country and exercising at the same time.
It shows too much asphalt and not enough of the surrounding countryside.  I'd hoped that it might give nature sounds.
